# SetMemoryDescriptor | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ USBDriverKit ](/documentation/usbdriverkit)

-  SetMemoryDescriptor 

Instance Method# SetMemoryDescriptor

DriverKit 19.0+

```
kern_return_t SetMemoryDescriptor(IOMemoryDescriptor * memoryDescriptor, uint32_t index);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/usbdriverkit/iousbhostpipe/setmemorydescriptor#parameters)

`memoryDescriptor`The memory descriptor associated with the ring index. Must not be NULL.

`index`Ring index to be populated

## [Return Value](/documentation/usbdriverkit/iousbhostpipe/setmemorydescriptor#return-value)

KERN_SUCCESS is successful see IOReturn.h for error codes.

## [Discussion](/documentation/usbdriverkit/iousbhostpipe/setmemorydescriptor#discussion)

Add a memory descriptor to the ring.

Caller must fill the ring starting at index 0. The entire ring must be populated up to index size-1
